channel.title: How to make a client
channel.description: I wanna make a client for my server, FREE one, but where to get? please tell clearly. i have 317 server? Allstar-scape

item.title: How to make a client
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“SandScape, post:9, topic:321163”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=417614.msg3070267#msg3070267 date=1261498363]

[quote author=SandScape link=topic=417614.msg3070265#msg3070265 date=1261498315]

[quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=417614.msg3070263#msg3070263 date=1261498206]

Allstar-Scape doesn’t use an client. It’s an silab server, so use the silab client at:http://client.silabsoft.org/client3.php

he still can make a client for his server. every server can use a client.

any to help you with your problem

get a 317 client that is a open source so you can edit it.

unless he uses a 317 deob, it will be glitchy to use a client. As he posted above, allstar is a silab server and so, it doesn’t use a client, neither was a client built to play it.
[/quote]as i said before up there if he gets a open source he can edit the client
so its not glitchy.

but the thing is he wants a client so if its glitchy he can always edit it where its not glitchy.

dude, if he got a open client, then i bet he wouldn’t be able to even login. trust me, you can’t use a client with allstar, unless…read above…
[/quote]you can i dont it before.so just stop arguing.

DUDE, no he can’t.
[/quote]dude your annoying.just be quiet.this is why your account is warned now.you argue for dumb stuff and end up doing stupid stuff.just shutup[/quote]Kid, you should shut it. We have been here for longtime, so you don’t have to learn us how to do it. ALLSTAR IS AN SILAB SERVER. Get over it, it will never be able to use an client, only if the real owner of Allstar make’s a new source which has a client. So, just piss out of the topic and quit posting. Thanks

Read full topic

unless he uses a 317 deob, it will be glitchy to use a client. As he posted above, allstar is a silab server and so, it doesn’t use a client, neither was a client built to play it.
[/quote]as i said before up there if he gets a open source he can edit the client
so its not glitchy.

but the thing is he wants a client so if its glitchy he can always edit it where its not glitchy.

dude, if he got a open client, then i bet he wouldn’t be able to even login. trust me, you can’t use a client with allstar, unless…read above…
[/quote]you can i dont it before.so just stop arguing.

DUDE, no he can’t.
[/quote]dude your annoying.just be quiet.this is why your account is warned now.you argue for dumb stuff and end up doing stupid stuff.just shutup

lol. i got moderated because i was defending someone, not this, what does this have to do with anything?

feel free to post me a link to allstar source.
[/quote]your annoying.point blank.[/quote]

feel free to send me a link to allstar source and ill show you.

Read full topic
